hero.title: Professional Snake Management
hero.subtitle: Made Simple
hero.description: Track, manage, and monitor your reptile collection with comprehensive health records, feeding schedules, and detailed analytics.

features.title: Everything You Need to Manage Your Collection
features.subtitle: Comprehensive tools designed specifically for reptile enthusiasts and professional breeders.

detailedProfiles.title: Detailed Profiles
detailedProfiles.description: Complete snake profiles with photos, species info, genetics, and health records.

eventTracking.title: Event Tracking
eventTracking.description: Monitor feeding schedules, shedding cycles, and veterinary appointments.

analytics.title: Analytics & Charts
analytics.description: Visual insights into growth patterns, feeding success, and health trends.

photoManagement.title: Photo Management
photoManagement.description: Organize and track photos with date stamps and automatic galleries.

exportReports.title: Export Reports
exportReports.description: Generate PDF and Excel reports for veterinarians or breeding records.

multiUser.title: Multi-User Access
multiUser.description: Share access with partners, veterinarians, or breeding collaborators.

testimonials.title: Trusted by Reptile Enthusiasts
testimonials.testimonial1: Snake Manager has revolutionized how I track my collection. The feeding schedules and health monitoring are invaluable.
testimonials.testimonial2: The analytics features help me optimize feeding schedules and track growth patterns like never before.
testimonials.testimonial3: As a veterinarian, the detailed health records and export features make my job so much easier.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your collection size

upgrade.limitReached: You've reached the limit of 5 snakes
upgrade.description: Upgrade to a paid plan to manage an unlimited collection and access all advanced features.

q1.question: Is my data secure?
q1.answer: Yes, we use enterprise-grade encryption and security measures to protect your data. All information is stored securely and backed up regularly.

q2.question: Can I export my data?
q2.answer: Absolutely. You can export all your data in PDF or Excel format at any time. We believe your data belongs to you.

q3.question: What if I need help getting started?
q3.answer: We offer comprehensive onboarding support and documentation. Our team is available to help you migrate your existing records.

footer.description: Professional reptile management for enthusiasts and breeders.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Have questions about Snake Manager? We'd love to hear from you.
contact.hoursText:
